attributes.action: get a  firm grip on immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ARE YOU AWARE HOW ANGY THE BRITISH PEOPLE ARE GETING ABOUT THE INFLUX OF IMMIGRANTS EVERYTHING IS BEING AFFECTED,ROADS,SCHOOLS.HOSPITALS,DENTISTS BUT MOST IMPORTANTLY BRITISH PEOPLES WAYS OF LIFE,WAKE UP YOU POLITICIANS BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE.WE THE HARD WORKING HONEST TAX PAYERS HAVE HAD ENOUGH

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
